typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as integer,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		yearmonth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DSCINPUT
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as integer,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		year as string,
		reference as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
select5 compose(mapColumn(
		id,
		PossAMid = POSSAMidString,
		reference = {Référence Article Fournisseur},
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantité en UV BL},
		qte_venteDirecte = {Qté vente directe}
	),
	composition: 'decrementationVenteDirecte') ~> fdecrementation@(output1)
DSCINPUT select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> KeepImportantColumn
columnFormat filter({Quantité en UV BL}!=0) ~> notNullQuantity
KeepImportantColumn derive({Quantité en UV BL} = toDouble({Quantité en UV BL}),
		{Marque Code} = toDouble({Marque Code}),
		year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)) ~> columnFormat
notNullQuantity filter(locate("Pièces détachées pour chauffage", {Sous Famille})>0) ~> pieceDetache
columnFormat filter({Quantité en UV BL}==0) ~> nullQuantity
notNullQuantity filter(locate("Pièces détachées pour chauffage", {Sous Famille})==0) ~> notPieceDetache
notPieceDetache filter(!isNull({Agence Code})) ~> agenceCodeNotNull
uniquePOSid filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posidNotNull
agenceCodeNotNull, posidNotNull join(toFloat({Agence Code}) == toFloat(POSid),
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerJoinWithOrga
agenceCodeNotNull, posidNotNull join({Agence Code} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftJoin
fullLeftJoin filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> leftOuter
ventesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		year,
		Article_right = reference,
		{Code client_right} = {Code client},
		{Qté vente directe} = qte_ecoulement
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameColumn
innerJoinWithOrga, RenameColumn join(columnFormat@year == RenameColumn@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence Article Fournisseur}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence Article Fournisseur}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article_right, " ", ""))),replace(Article_right, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerVentesDirecte
innerJoinWithOrga, RenameColumn join(columnFormat@year == RenameColumn@year
	&& coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace({Référence Article Fournisseur}, " ", ""))),replace({Référence Article Fournisseur}, " ", "")) == coalesce(toString(toInteger(replace(Article_right, " ", ""))),replace(Article_right, " ", ""))
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client_right},
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeftVentesDirectes
select4 select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSid,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		BrandID,
		year,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns2
fullLeftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(RenameColumn@year) || isNull(Article_right) || isNull({Code client_right})) ~> outerLeft
outerLeft select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		year = columnFormat@year,
		month,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSid,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
fullLeftUnion select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = {Marque DESC},
		sous_famille = {Sous Famille},
		reference = {Référence Article Fournisseur},
		agence_code = {Agence Code},
		departement_id = {Département ID},
		qte_ecoulement = {Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		HubSAPid,
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		distributeur
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
dropColumns2 derive(departement_id = toDouble(''),
		prix_unitaire_std = toDouble(''),
		distributeur = "DSC") ~> Addcolumn
organisation aggregate(groupBy(POSid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		POSSAMidString = first(POSSAMidString),
		HubSAPid = first(HubSAPid),
		BrandID = first(BrandID)) ~> uniquePOSid
Addcolumn, dropColumns union(byName: true)~> fullLeftUnion
InnerVentesDirecte select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		year = columnFormat@year,
		month,
		POSid,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		BrandID,
		{Qté vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
select1 keyGenerate(output(idDecrementation as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> idDecrementation
idDecrementation select(mapColumn(
		idDecrementation,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		year,
		month,
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		{Qté vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
select2 derive({Quantité en UV BL} = toFloat({Quantité en UV BL}),
		{Qté vente directe} = toFloat({Qté vente directe}),
		month = toInteger(month)) ~> derivedColumn1
idDecrementation select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		POSid,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		BrandID,
		{Qté vente directe},
		idDecrementation
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select3
select3, endDecrementation join(idDecrementation == id,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
fdecrementation@output1 select(mapColumn(
		id,
		qt_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endDecrementation
join1 select(mapColumn(
		{Marque DESC},
		{Marque Code},
		{Sous Famille},
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		{Agence Code},
		{Département ID},
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		POSid,
		WholeSalerID,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		BrandID,
		{Qté vente directe},
		{Quantité en UV BL} = qt_final
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select4
derivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		id = idDecrementation,
		POSSAMidString,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur},
		year,
		month,
		{Quantité en UV BL},
		{Qté vente directe}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select5
pieceDetache sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_PIECE_DETACHEE.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> DSCPieceDetache
nullQuantity sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> outputNullQuantity
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Org_commerciale as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Ann�e civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{CA cd�} as string,
		{Qt� livr�e} as string,
		{CA livr�} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		{Cout standard cd�} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livr�} as string,
		{Cout standard factur�} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		{P�riode} as string,
		Offre as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		data_origin as string,
		{Ecoulement origin} as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{ATC performance} as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> preparedDSC
leftOuter sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		POSid as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['DSC_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> orgaNotFound
